snippet: A former employee of the American Humane Association says she witnessed the widespread abuse of animals used in the making of the now-canceled HBO series "Luck" and that she was fired to keep her from reporting her findings.
abstract: A former employee of the American Humane Association says she witnessed the widespread abuse of animals used in the making of the now-canceled HBO series "Luck" and that she was fired to keep her from reporting her findings.

headline.main: Lawsuit Against HBO Claims Cruelty to Animals on 'Luck'
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Against HBO Asserts Cruelty to Animals
